title: Blix Packa Genie adds Affordable Electric Cargo Bike, Updates eBike Lineup
content:
Santa Cruz’s Blix, claimed to be one of the fastest-growing ebike companies in the US, announced multiple updates today. Changes are on deck for commuter, cruiser, cargo, and folding ebikes, with a focus on increased power and range and improved rider experience.
